Class-Rogue 20 -- Male Versatile Human Rogue: 20
Strength: +3 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +4 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +3
Background: Artisan Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 19341/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 8/13
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Cloud Step: Can Stride over insubstantial surfaces and weight-triggered traps
Implausible Infiltration: (2) Can move through up to 10' of wood, plaster, or stone
Light Step: Can Stride or Step normally over difficult terrain
Features/Skills

Feature Notes:
Advanced General Training: General Feat (Choose 1 from any up to level 7)
Alchemical Crafting: Has the Formula Book feature
Ancestral Paragon: Ancestry Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Ancestry Feats: Ancestry Feats (Choose 5 from any)
General Feats: General Feats (Choose 5 from any)
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Predictive Purchase: Has the Prescient Planner and Prescient Consumable features
Rogue Feats: Class Feats (Choose 11 from any)
Rogue Key Attribute: 1 selection
Rogue's Racket: 1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 20 from any)
Versatile Human: General Feat (Choose 1 from any)
Adopted Ancestry (Leshy): Can take Leshy ancestry feats
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Implausible Purchase: Can use Prescient Planner at will with 1 action, and can use it to retrieve a level 14 consumable 5 times per day
Predictive Purchase: Can use Prescient Planner with 2 actions
Prescient Consumable: Can retrieve an undeclared consumable from backpack once per shopping trip
Prescient Planner: Can retrieve an undeclared piece of adventuring gear from backpack once per shopping trip
Perception: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Skill Modifiers:
Abadar Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Guild Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Piloting Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Academia Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Hellknights Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +24 (wisdom; untrained)
Acrobatics: +32 (dexterity; legendary) Intimidation: +25 (charisma; trained) River Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Arcana: +24 (intelligence; untrained) Medicine: +26 (wisdom; trained) Society: +28 (intelligence; expert)
Astronomy Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Mercantile Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Stealth: +32 (dexterity; legendary)
Athletics: +29 (strength; master) Military Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Survival: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Crafting: +26 (intelligence; trained) Nature: +24 (wisdom; untrained) Tanning Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Deception: +31 (charisma; legendary) Occultism: +28 (intelligence; expert) Thievery: +32 (dexterity; legendary)
Diplomacy: +27 (charisma; expert) Orc Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Underworld Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Giant Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +23 (charisma; untrained) Warfare Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Languages: Common; Dwarven; Elven; Empyrean; Goblin; Halfling; Pyric; Sussuran
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Abadar Lore): Skill Legendary (Abadar Lore)
Alchemical Crafting: Knows the formulas for at least 4 common 1st-level alchemical items
Duplicated Training: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Mastermind: Skill Trained (Society; Choose 1 from Arcana, Nature, Occultism, Religion)
Multilingual: +2 Language Count
Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Perception Legend: Perception Legendary
Perception Mastery: Perception Master
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 11 from any)
Ruffian: Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Scoundrel: Skill Trained (Deception; Diplomacy)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 19 from any)
Skill Training (Academia Lore): Skill Trained (Academia Lore)
Skill Training (Intimidation): Skill Trained (Intimidation)
Thief: Skill Trained (Thievery)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Alchemical Crafting: Can use Crafting to create alchemical items
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Courtly Graces: Can use Society to impersonate a noble or to Make An Impression on one
Delay Trap: (R) Successful Thievery check delays or disables triggering trap activation; critical failure inflicts off-guard until the start of the next turn
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the normal income
Experienced Smuggler: Automatically gets at least 10 on Stealth rolls to conceal a small item
Formula Book: Has a book that contains at least 4 alchemical formulas
Group Coercion: Can use Intimidation to Coerce 5 targets
Hidden Paragon: (R) Successful Hide or Sneak vs. all foes allows becoming invisible for 1 min once per hr
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Leverage Connections: Can use Society to gain a meeting with an important figure or to exchange favors
Pickpocket: Can Steal a closely-guarded object without penalty/Can use 2 actions to Steal with a -5 penalty from an alert creature
Plant Evidence: (1) Successful Thievery vs. Perception allows planting a light item on target; can also be done as a free action as part of a Shove
Poison Weapon: Can prepare 20 poisons that inflict 1d4 HP poison during daily prep
Quick Coercion: Can Coerce with 1 rd of conversation
Quick Repair: Can Repair an item in 1 min
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze at full Speed
Read Lips: Can read the lips of those who can be seen clearly; in difficult circumstances, this requires a Society check and can inflict fascinated and off-guard
Reconstruct The Scene: 1 min survey gives impressions of events that occurred within the prior day
Sense The Unseen: (R) Makes undetected foes hidden after a failed Seek
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Snare Crafting: Can use Crafting to create snares and knows the formulas for 4 common snares
Sneak Adept: Normal failures on Sneak actions are successes
Specialty Crafting: +1 Crafting on a selected type of item
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Terrain Stalker (Snow): Sneaking 5' in snow at least 10' from foes requires no Stealth check
Trap Finder: Gives +2 Perception and automatic Searches to find traps and allows disabling traps that require legendary proficiency in Thievery
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 41 (dexterity (3 max); master) Class DC: Rogue: 40 (dexterity; master)
Armor: Chain Shirt Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Bo Staff (+29 1d8+3 B; strength; master); Lance (+29 1d8+3 P [Crit +d8]; strength; master); Light Hammer (+29 1d6+3 B R30'; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Bloody Debilitation: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Critical Debilitation: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Double Debilitation: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Impossible Striker: Has increased Sly Striker effects
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Light Armor Mastery: Defense Master (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Master Strike: Class Master (Rogue)
Master Tricks: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Methodical Debilitations: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Nimble Roll: Has increased Nimble Dodge effects
Precise Debilitations: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Rogue Expertise: Class Expert (Rogue)
Ruffian: Defense Master (Medium Armor)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strong Arm: +10 thrown weapon range
Tactical Debilitations: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Thief: +1 damage with finesse melee weapons
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Unconventional Weaponry (Club): Weapon Familiarity (Club)
Unconventional Weaponry (Shield Bash): Weapon Familiarity (Shield Bash)
Vicious Debilitations: Has increased Debilitating Strike effects
Weapon Tricks: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Analyze Weakness: (1) Next sneak attack on an identified target inflicts +4d6 HP precision
Anticipate Ambush: Moving at half Speed during travel allows using Perception for initiative and inflicts -2 on foes using Stealth for initiative
Blind-Fight: Can attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Does not suffer off-guard vs. hidden foes/Treats adjacent undetected creatures up to level 20 as hidden instead
Brutal Beating: Critical successes on Strikes inflict frightened 1
Bullseye: (1) Next Strike with a thrown weapon before the end of the turn gains +1 attack, ignores target concealment, and reduces target cover
Clever Gambit: (R) Follows a critical hit on an identified creature with a Step or Stride that does not provoke target reactions
Debilitating Strike: (F) Successful Strike against an off-guard foe also inflicts 2 choices from: prevent flanking; negate Armor Class bonus from shields, lesser cover, and standard cover; +3d6 HP persistent bleed; +2d6 HP precision; off-guard; weakness 5 to a choice of damage type; clumsy 1; prevent reactions; prevent flanking; slowed 2 until the end of the next turn (save Fortitude inflicts slowed 1, critical success negates, and critical failure inflicts paralyzed); -10 Speed until the end of the next turn; enfeebled 1 until the end of the next turn
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer off-guard vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 20
Dispelling Slice: (2) Successful sneak attack allows a level 10, +30 counteract attempt to dispel a magical effect
Distracting Feint: Successful Feints inflict -2 Perception and Reflex saves while the target remains off-guard
Dread Striker: Frightened foes are off-guard vs. self attacks
Fantastic Leap: (2) Strikes after Long Jump or a High Jump that uses Long Jump distance
Far Throw: Reduces the penalty for each additional range increment on thrown weapons to -1
Felling Shot: (2) Successful Strike vs. a off-guard airborne foe inflicts a 120' fall (save Reflex negates; critical failure also inflicts grounded until the end of the next turn)
Gang Up: Self and allies flank any foe within reach of both
Head Stomp: (1) Successful unarmed melee Strike vs. a prone foe inflicts stupefied 1 and off-guard, or stupefied 2 and off-guard on a critical hit, until the end of the next turn
Improved Poison Weapon: Poisoned weapons inflict +2d4 HP poison, and a critical miss does not waste the poison
Inspired Stratagem: (R) Five previously-briefed allies can use the better of 2 attack or skill rolls once per day
Instant Opening: (1) R30' Inflicts off-guard vs. self attacks until the end of the next turn
Intimidating Glare: Can use a glare to Demoralize
Leave An Opening: Critical hit on a off-guard foe allows a chosen ally to make a Reactive Strike
Master Strike: (F) Successful Strike on an off-guard foe inflicts paralyzed for 4 rd once per target per day; (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 2 until the end of the next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts a choice of paralyzed for 4 rd, unconscious for 2 hr, or killed)
Mastermind: Successful Recall Knowledge to identify a creature inflicts off-guard vs. self attacks until the start of the next turn, or for 1 min on a critical success
Mobility: Can Stride at half Speed without triggering reactions
Mug: (2) Successful sneak attack vs. an adjacent foe allows a Steal attempt
Nimble Dodge: (R) Gives +2 Armor Class against the triggering attack when unencumbered; success allows a 10' Stride
Nimble Strike: Can make a Strike during Nimble Dodge, unaffected by any multiple attack penalty
Opportune Backstab: (R) Strikes a foe immediately after an ally hits it
Overextending Feint: Successful Feint inflicts -2 on target's next attack vs. self, or on all attacks vs. self with a critical success, until the end of its next rd
Poison Weapon: (1) Applies a poison to a weapon
Powerful Sneak: Sneak attack ignores precision immunity and resistance, and sneak attack damage dice on the first attack before the end of the next turn after a Sneak have a minimum roll of 3
Predictable!: (1) Successful Sense Motive vs. Deception gives +1 AC and +1 on the next save vs. target until the start of the next turn, or +2 on a critical success, or -1 on a critical failure
Preparation: (1) Gives 1 additional rogue reaction that can be used before the start of the next turn
Quick Draw: (1) Draws a weapon and Strikes
Reactive Distraction: (R) Uses Perfect Distraction to redirect the triggering effect or attack on self to a decoy
Reactive Interference: (R) Prevents an adjacent foe reaction; a higher-level foe requires a successful attack roll
Reactive Pursuit: (R) Moves to remain adjacent to a retreating foe
Ricochet Feint: While in Ricochet Stance, can use Feint against a creature within the first range increment of a wielded thrown weapon
Ricochet Stance: (1) Stance causes thrown bludgeoning and slashing weapons to return up to their listed range increment after a ranged Strike
Ruffian: Can sneak attack using any weapon other than simple or martial weapons that deal greater than d8 or d6 damage, and critical hits with one of these weapons on an off-guard foe inflict its critical specialization effect
Sabotage: (1) Successful Thievery vs. Reflex inflicts 64 HP damage, or 128 HP on a critical success, to an item with moving parts possessed by a creature within reach
Scoundrel's Surprise: (1) Removing a disguise inflicts off-guard vs. the next self attack on unaware foes until the end of the turn
Scoundrel: Successful Feint inflicts off-guard vs. self attacks, or vs. all attacks on a critical success, until the end of the next turn/Can take a free Step after a successful Feint with an agile or finesse weapon
Scout's Warning: (F) Gives allies +1 initiative
Shove Down: (F) Follows a Shove with a Trip; can be used even when the foe is no longer within reach
Sidestep: (R) Redirects a failed Strike on self to an adjacent creature
Skirmish Strike: (1) Steps before or after a Strike
Sly Disarm: Can use Thievery to Disarm; success inflicts off-guard against the next self attack before the end of the turn
Sly Striker: Successful Strikes with a sneak attack weapon inflict full sneak attack damage
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a off-guard foe inflicts +4d6 HP precision damage
Spring From The Shadows: (1) Strikes a foe after an undetected Stride
Stay Down!: (R) Successful Athletics vs. Fortitude negates the triggering Stand action; critical success prevents the target from Standing until its next turn
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Swift Elusion: (R) Successful Acrobatics vs. Reflex of a foe moving to an adjacent spot allows Striding or moving the foe to a different adjacent spot
Swipe Souvenir: (2) Successful Escape allows a Steal attempt
Tactical Entry: (F) Strides without provoking reactions after rolling Stealth for initiative
The Harder They Fall: Successful Trip inflicts 1d6 HP bludgeoning, plus sneak attack damage on a critical success
Trap Finder: +2 Armor Class vs. traps
Tumble Behind: Successful Tumble Through inflicts off-guard against the next self attack until the end of the turn
Twin Distraction: Successful Twin Feint attacks with both weapons inflict stupefied 1 until the end of the next turn (save Will negates)
Twin Feint: (2) Strikes with a melee weapon in each hand; target is off-guard vs. the second
Twist The Knife: (1) Inflicts 4 HP persistent bleed damage after a successful sneak attack on a off-guard foe
Unbalancing Blow: Critical hits inflict off-guard vs. self attacks until the end of the next turn
Underhanded Assault: (2) Makes a melee Strike after a successful -2 Stealth vs. a foe that is adjacent to an ally
Watch Your Back: (1) R30' Successful Intimidation vs. Will gives target +2 Perception vs. self and inflicts -2 Will saves vs. fear for 1 min
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Weapon Tricks: Critical hits with an agile or finesse unarmed attack or weapon vs. an off-guard foe inflict its critical specialization effect
You're Next: (R) After downing a foe, makes a +2 Intimidation check to Demoralize another within 60'
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +32 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Agile Mind: Save Master (Will)
Evasive Reflexes: Save Master (Reflex)
Greater Rogue Reflexes: Save Legendary (Reflex)
Rogue Resilience: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Agile Mind: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Blank Slate: Immune to detection, revelation and scrying effects of less than counteract rank 10
Cognitive Loophole: (R) At the end of a turn, suppresses a mental effect affecting self until the end of the next turn
Defensive Roll: (F) Negates half the damage from an attack that would reduce self to 0 HP once per 10 min
Evasive Reflexes: Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Greater Rogue Reflexes: Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures, and failed Reflex saves inflict half damage
Nimble Roll: Can use Nimble Dodge on a Reflex save
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Trap Finder: +2 vs. traps
Magic
Magic Notes: Perfect Distraction: (1) Creates a decoy that gives Mislead effects once per 10 min
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 81 allocated
Rogue Racket Allocation: 1 available vs. 4 allocated
